articles.author: Stephanie Pappas
articles.title: Massive tectonic collision causing Himalayas to grow may also be splitting Tibet apart - Livescience.com
articles.description: The Indian plate may be peeling into two as it slides under the Eurasian plate, tearing Tibet apart in the process.
articles.content:
Tibet may be tearing in two beneath the rising Himalayas, with pieces of the continental plate peeling off like the lid off a tin of fish, researchers have discovered.
According to new research pres… [+3092 chars]
